column4: hi all - I am looking forward to getting 9.04 and am tempted to install the beta now.  However I dont really want to rebuild when the final release comes out - I presume the updates released will take the beta upto the full release but are there any disadvantages with this?
actionparsnip: thats fine thanks - i know its only a week ago but I want to play with it now so will download the beta - I guess also miss the busy mirrors on release day
wait for the official release if you want your system to last several future distro updates.
i always do a fresh install anyway - dont like upgrading between versions
